biocontainers.name: r-rann
biocontainers.summary: Finds the k nearest neighbours for every point in a given dataset in O(N log N) time using Arya and Mounts ANN library (v1.1.3). There is support for approximate as well as exact searches, fixed radius searches and bd as well as kd trees. The distance is computed using the L2 (Euclidean) metric. Please see package RANN.L1 for the same functionality using the L1 (Manhattan, taxicab) metric.
